description: In this game, you’ll meet 12 enchanting beauties studying at a magical academy. Find your way to each of their hearts in this captivating puzzle adventure!
Title: Anime Uni 3

description: Soccer Goal Run Dive into the exhilarating action of Soccer Goal Run, a hyper-casual game where every move counts! Your player automatically sprints forward, controlling him left and right to avoid obstacles, collect coins and recruit teammates along the way. Journey through 25 unique levels, each featuring different environments and challenges. Collect enough coins by the end of the level to earn a shot at the goal. Hit the target and score! Are you ready to navigate obstacles, gather coins, and lead your team to victory? Experience the thrill in Soccer Goal Run!
Title: Soccer Goal Run

description: Dive into the daring and vibrant niche of hentai retail with Hentai Shop Simulator, a stylized management simulation game where you can fulfill the fantasies of an underserved market. As the owner of a specialty shop, you'll cater to the enthusiastic fans of hentai, selling everything from mainstream magazines to rare collectibles. Key Features: Specialty Retail Mastery: Capitalize on the exclusive market of hentai publications. Curate a diverse inventory that appeals to a wide audience, from casual readers to hardcore collectors. Engage with Unique Customers: Connect with a colorful array of customers, each with distinct tastes and preferences. Tailor your approach to customer service to boost satisfaction and drive repeat business. Creative Shop Design: Express your style by designing your hentai shop. Choose from a range of thematic decorations and layout designs that echo the bold and graphic nature of hentai. Dynamic Business Challenges: Navigate the fluctuating demands of a niche market. Respond to seasonal peaks, manage stock during special promotions, and maximize sales through strategic marketing. Financial Acumen: Operate under realistic economic conditions. Manage expenses, optimize pricing, and expand your shop to become a cornerstone of the hentai retail community. Vivid, Artful Aesthetics: Enjoy a game that embraces the artistry of hentai with vibrant graphics and animations that bring your shop and its products to life. Step into a world where business meets pleasure and every decision impacts your growth. Hentai Shop Simulator offers you a chance to explore a bold venture, grow a thriving business, and become a celebrated figure in a passionate community. Are you ready to build your empire in this exciting retail adventure?
Title: Hentai Shop Simulator

description: Empires Shall Fall is a turn-based tactics game set in a dieselpunk world. Upgrade your army and command your troops, then exploit terrain to eradicate your enemies with sheer power and sharp tactics. The Great War is being waged between the Black Empire and the Blue League. For a long time, these two superpowers have struggled for domination. Take control of either faction in this turn-based tactics game and launch attacks to crush the opposition! Inspired by classics, Empires Shall Fall uses a grid-based map with easy-to-learn controls. Use the terrain to your advantage by strategically moving units across the board. Choose your position — will you join the aggressive, war-waging Black Empire, or support the Blue League’s holy conquest? Features: - Non-random combat. - A wide range of unit types, from hardy foot soldiers to powerful tanks. - Challenging boss fights that will put your tactical skills to the test. - Hotseat multiplayer that lets you challenge your friends on one device. - Three story campaigns with hand-designed levels to ensure you’ll need to use both brain and brawn to succeed. - Unit upgrades with special skills and weaknesses.
Title: Empires Shall Fall

description: Immerse Yourself in the World of Farming! Get ready for an exciting adventure in Farming Sim 25: Drive Tractors, Combine, Trucks – the most realistic and engaging farming game ever! Here, you can become a true master of agribusiness, operating a variety of machinery: from powerful tractors and high-tech combines to trucks that will make your farm thrive. Why Play Farming Sim 25: Drive Tractors, Combine, Trucks ? - Diverse Vehicle Selection: Operate a wide range of authentic farming machinery, each with unique capabilities for different tasks.Drive tractors that will help you plow fields, combines for harvesting crops, and trucks for transporting your products. - Realistic Farming Mechanics : Engage in crop management, animal husbandry, and resource planning to build a successful farm. - Picturesque Locations: Explore vast fields, beautiful farms, and charming villages, all rendered in stunning graphics with dynamic weather. - Strategic Management: Grow your farm by cultivating a variety of crops and raising animals. Implement smart strategies to maximize your yield and profits, turning your farm into a successful business. Farming Sim 25: Drive Tractors, Combine, Trucks is more than just a game; it’s an opportunity to feel the spirit of farming, make decisions, and develop your business in the agricultural world. Choose your ideal machine and dive into the world of agronomy.
Title: Farming Sim 25: Drive Tractors, Combine, Trucks

description: Rule the streets of New York in this adrenaline-fueled urban driving experience. Blend the thrill of open-world action with gritty taxi life in a stunning next-gen adventure powered by Unreal Engine 5's revolutionary graphics. Speed through ray-traced streets of Manhattan, outsmart rival drivers, and build your empire in a living city where every fare could lead to an unexpected adventure. Choose between playing it straight or diving into the city's underground racing scene. Key Features: Massive Open World: A seamless, living New York City filled with opportunities and secrets Dynamic Weather System: Navigate through intense rain storms, heavy snow, and thick fog Street Rep System: Rise from rookie driver to legendary street king Day/Night Cycle: Different crowds, different challenges, different dangers Experience dramatic weather shifts affecting visibility and handling - from blinding snowstorms to treacherous rain-slicked streets. Every shift brings new challenges and opportunities in this living, breathing city. Choose your path: Build a legitimate taxi empire or risk everything in NYC's dangerous underground scene. Your reputation grows with every fare, every race, and every chase. Welcome to New York, where every ride could be your ticket to glory or your last fare. The meter's running – time to show these streets what you're made of.
Title: Grand Taxi Auto

description: â– Story Mika and the Witch’s Mountain is a fantasy adventure about an aspiring witch who delivers packages to the townspeople of a small island. Explore every nook and cranny and soar through the sky with your magic broom. This coming-of-age journey will take us to the top of the mountain through a story of effort, friendship, and community; and will let our hearts fly free. Take your magic broom and discover all the secrets hidden in the mountain while getting to know its charming inhabitants. Work hard and get a magic broom good enough to achieve your goal: to go to the top of the mountain. â–  Features - Fly over a beautiful island. Explore a mini open world full of secrets and magic. - Protect the packages from the elements as you fly around the island. - Play as a little witch who works delivering packages on a small island. - Complete your collection with different outfits, trails, treasures and more. - A cozy light-heart story for you to unwind and relax.
Title: Mika and the Witch's Mountain

description: You entered a train station and appear to be stuck in a loop. Multiple levels to test your observation skill. See if you have what it takes to escape the loop!
Title: Exit Station 7

description: You're on a mission to find Room 96, but you're caught in a never-ending loop. To break free, you'll need to sharpen your senses and master your surroundings. Start on floor 0, where you'll get a chance to study the layout of objects in the area. But be warned—the moment you're ready to play, the timer starts ticking. Make the right choices to ascend to the next floor, but one wrong move sends you back to square one. Pay close attention to every detail—your observation skills are your only way out. If you don’t spot any anomalies, take the elevator labeled “No Anomalies.” But if something feels off, trust your instincts and choose the elevator marked “Confirm Anomalies.” Find Room 96 is a thrilling, fast-paced game. Currently, there are multiple levels, some are locked. But don’t worry, you can unlock them by conquering the timer challenge. Are you ready to escape the loop and find Room 96?
Title: Find Room 96

description: MASTER OF BOW! Step into the world of archery where precision and skill are your greatest allies. In Master of Bow, take on the role of a master archer and challenge yourself to hit a variety of targets—from straw big targets and wooden smaller moving targets to flying balloons and mannequins. 25 UNIQUE LEVELS! Traverse through 25 exciting levels, each set in breathtaking environments like enchanted forests, frozen lakes, and autumnal woods. Each stage brings new challenges and types of targets that will test your aim and timing. LIMITED ARROWS, UNLIMITED FUN! With a set number of arrows in each level, every shot counts. Can you hit every target and pass the level before running out of arrows? Strategy and precision are key to success. DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO BE THE MASTER OF BOW? Prove your archery skills and conquer all 25 levels. The journey won’t be easy, but only the best will rise to become the ultimate Master of Bow! Will you be one of them?
Title: Master Of Bow

description: "Jewel Rotation" is a fun and addictive puzzle game. It features: Three game modes: Beginner, Expert and Infinite HD graphics Tutorial for an easy start! Instructions: The board consists of four side-to-side layers filled with sparkling jewels. You have a quota to clear a number of specific kinds of jewels. You clear jewels by rotating the layers so that four of the same jewels line up. When you get a four of a kind, those jewels vanish and are replaced by more jewels. If you meet your jewel quota, you go to the next level for a tougher puzzle. You also have a time limit, so you better get those jewels out of there quickly!
Title: Jewel Rotation

description: Bid Battle: Auction War Simulator Storage Hunter is a high-stakes thrill ride into the world of storage unit auctions. Compete against rivals in intense bidding wars for abandoned units brimming with potential treasure. Unleash your inner auction hunter as you delve into a treasure trove of forgotten items. From antique gold to rare collectibles, every unit holds surprises. Strategically bid, expertly negotiate, and build your fortune. Key Features: • Heart-pounding Auctions: Engage in fierce bidding battles with other players. • Treasure Hunting Extravaganza: Discover a world of hidden gems and valuable items. • Diverse Storage Units: Explore a variety of units, each with its own unique challenges and rewards. • Profit and Power: Build your empire by selling valuable finds and investing wisely. • Competitive Edge: Master your bidding strategy and outsmart your opponents. • Immersive Experience: Feel the adrenaline rush of real-life auction hunting. Experience the thrill of the auction block and the satisfaction of discovering hidden fortunes. Can you outbid, outsmart, and outplay the competition?
Title: Bid Battle: Auction War Simulator Storage Hunter

description: "Jewel Fever 3" is the much improved successor to the highly succesful "Jewel Fever 2" which is played by millions of people. It adds new gamemodes, better graphics and finally local and online multiplayer! It features: - Classic gamemodes Normal, Quick and Infinite! - Mission mode with 30 missions to solve! - AI-mode with 4 different AI-Opponents in 2 game modes! - Local and online multiplayer! - 15 Achievements
Title: Jewel Fever 3

description: Along with 24,000 Pro Team Credits IT’S TIME TO FLY!! FEEL THE ATMOSPHERE. As the crowd shouts BALL, ride every bump, take every tackle, flying high as acclaimed commentators - Anthony Hudson, Jason Bennett, Kelli Underwood, Garry Lyon and Daniel Harford take you inside the action. CHASE YOUR DREAMS. Manage your list, develop draftees into champions, take tactical control on game day, make the right moves and lead your team to premiership glory! MAKE IT YOUR OWN. Create and share your own clubs, players, and stadiums with the World-Renowned Academy Tools. THIS TIME IT IS REAL! All AFL and AFLW teams have been meticulously modelled, including photogrammetry captures of over 1200 players, matched with their individual skills and traits powered by Champion Data – THIS TIME IT IS REAL!
Title: AFL 23 - PRO TEAM BUNDLE

description: Get ready for double the bubble-popping action with the Bpop Double Game Bundle! First, tackle colorful explosions in Bpop, where you strategically link combos to clear the screen. Then, race against an AI rival in Bpop Attack, shooting bubbles and collecting power-ups to finish levels faster. Two exciting games in one bundle, perfect for fans of arcade challenges!
Title: Bpop Double Game Bundle

description: Get ready for double the bubble-popping action with the Bpop Double Game Bundle! First, tackle colorful explosions in Bpop, where you strategically link combos to clear the screen. Then, race against an AI rival in Bpop Attack, shooting bubbles and collecting power-ups to finish levels faster. Two exciting games in one bundle, perfect for fans of arcade challenges!
Title: Bpop Double Game Bundle

description: Circle of Nature is a captivating platformer where you control a dynamic ball with a unique purpose: to collect special diamonds that help nature thrive. As you gather these precious gems, you gain points and watch as the environment around you grows and flourishes, one piece at a time. Simple yet challenging, the gameplay revolves around jumping to avoid obstacles, collecting diamonds, and even reversing your ball’s direction to navigate tricky paths. Can you master the art of nature’s restoration? Take on the challenge and help the world around you blossom!
Title: Circle Of Nature

description: The full Boti: Byteland Overclocked experience + all 4 add-on DLCs, digital soundtrack and artbook all in one. A Unique Blend of Nostalgic and Fresh 3D Platformer Experience Boti: Byteland Overclocked combines classic 3D platforming with a splash of innovation. Double jump, dash, hover, and glide through vibrant levels, discovering fantastic combos inspired by the very essence of computers and technology. Co-operative Fun with Friends Enjoy the pure delight of gaming together in our drop-in, drop-out co-operative mode. Bond with a friend on your quest to save Byteland, with the gameplay seamlessly adapting between solo and two-player modes. Because everything is better… TOGETHER! Meet The Cheerful Trio Join Boti, the endearing data bot, and his charming companions, Zero and One, on an enchanting quest to rid Byteland of bugs, viruses, and glitches. Their cute, quirky dialogues will make you chuckle. Uncover creative gameplay features Experience a neat twist on classic platforming. Master creative arcade elements, such as rhythm-driven musical slides and magnetic gameplay, to explore and conquer challenges like never before. Vibrant, colorful world inspired by computers and technology Dive into Byteland, exploring the secrets of a cyber-world inspired by computers and technology both new and old. You’ll find a plethora of collectibles and data to assemble and relocate to their proper places inside the byte-tastic world of Boti! All add-on DLCs and extras included Grab the full digital artbook and soundtrack alongside all 4 add-on DLCs . We’ve got dino vs robot battles, expansive Winter and Halloween add-on maps, and hovercraft races.
Title: Boti: Byteland Overclocked Deluxe Edition

description: Deluxe Edition includes: - The base game - A captain outfit: the Libertine set - The Born With It and Stay Alive emotes - The Pissed and Sea of Tears fireworks Set sail into the vibrant open world of Skull and Bones, a naval online action RPG where you rise to become the most fearsome pirate kingpin. ENGAGE IN SPECTACULAR NAVAL COMBAT Prepare for devastating battles by crafting a dozen different ships and equip your fleet with powerful loadouts. Unlock stronger weapons as you progress and customize your ships to reflect your unique pirate playstyle. SAIL INTO A DANGEROUS HELL IN PARADISE Voyage into the Indian Ocean and explore a vast open world teeming with cutthroat pirates, deadly sea monsters, supernatural threats, devastating storms, and more. TEAM UP WITH FELLOW PIRATES Sail the lawless seas solo or team up with two friends or other players to partake in shareable contracts and rewards. ENJOY EVER-EVOLVING CONTENT Each season, face a brand-new legendary sea lord and discover fresh content, limitless endgame opportunities, and new exciting features designed to enhance your pirate experience. Internet connection, Ubisoft Account, PlayStationâ„¢Network account, and PlayStationÂ®Plus subscription (sold separately) required to access online multiplayer/features.
Title: Skull and Bones Deluxe Edition

description: Ball Cannon is an exciting puzzle game where your goal is to hit special objects that spawn colorful balls. With 25 levels of increasing difficulty, you'll face unique challenges like breaking glass to release balls or using jumpers to bounce your shots and destroy the spawning objects. Each level introduces new mechanics, testing both your aim and strategy. Do you have what it takes to master all 25 levels? Get ready for a fast-paced, fun-filled experience!
Title: Ball Cannon

description: Shapeo is an endless arcade game where different shapes such as circles, triangles, and squares are continuously generated. You play as a small sphere, traveling along a path toward each shape. The twist? You must match the corresponding shape on your controller to pass through. For instance, when you're in a triangle, you must press the triangle button. As the game progresses, the pace quickens, making it increasingly challenging to keep up. There are checkpoints to help track your progress, but the game never truly ends—it's a test of endurance and reflexes. How high can you score? Challenge yourself and see how long you can last!
Title: Shapeo

description: Cross-buy: With the purchase of this bundle you will receive the PlayStationÂ®4 and PlayStationÂ®5 version of the game. Cross-Save: Pick up playing on the PlayStationÂ®5 exactly where you left off on the PlayStationÂ®4 at any time by simply importing the save game from the PlayStationÂ®4 version! From the makers of The Jumping Food Games comes the sequel to the popular puzzle game "Color Swiper". In this expansion you can expect new, hand-crafted, tricky levels in which the aim is to fill all the squares with skillful swiping movements! What can you expect in "Color Swiper 2"? Cleverly designed levels: Each level brings new challenges and becomes increasingly demanding - will you manage to fill in all the squares perfectly? Easy to learn, difficult to master: The intuitive swipe controls make it easy to get started, but the tricky levels require strategic thinking and precision. Colorful puzzle worlds: Immerse yourself in a visually appealing world full of bright colors and creative patterns. Thrilling gameplay: Perfect your swipe technique and experience the satisfying feeling of filling every square cleanly. Are you ready to master all the levels and crack the tricky color puzzles? Test your skills in "Color Swiper 2"!
Title: Color Swiper 2 -

description: In this game, you’ll meet 12 enchanting beauties studying at a magical academy. Find your way to each of their hearts in this captivating puzzle adventure!

description: Try this incredible mix of track and field and running. Pole vaulting through the course is something very unusual and unrealistically fun! It is very important to choose the right direction and the right moment for the next jump. The higher the obstacle you choose, the harder the game, but also the higher the reward. You can defeat your opponents using different tactics. Which ones? You'll have to find out as you play. Complete all the levels and collect all the prizes. You can even unlock fun skins for your athletes. Have fun with this new sport! Cross-Save: Pick up where you left off on PlayStationÂ®4 at any time on PlayStationÂ®5 by simply importing your save game from the PlayStationÂ®4 version! Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. Watch out for your new favorite sport!
Title: Vaulting Champions

description: Dive into a frosty world packed with snow-filled challenges and chilly adventures designed to bring warmth and excitement to your cold winter days. From snowball battles to icy races, there’s something for everyone to enjoy solo or with family and friends. Take on the leaderboard to see who can claim the highest score by challenging your friends in the multiplayer mode — up to 8 players can join by simply passing around one controller. With a delightful mix of arcade-inspired games like Tetrice, Polar Cross, Frostbreaker, and Winter Match 3, this collection offers countless hours of fun. WINTER WONDERLAND BY TRAIN – Hop on a magical train ride that takes you through snowy landscapes, stopping at every station for a new game. WINTER-THEMED GAME MODES – From high-speed bobsled relays to precision snowball throws, each game captures the festive spirit of the winter season. ADORABLE CHARACTERS – Choose from 8 unique, winter-loving characters to add personality to every game. MULTIPLAYER FUN FOR ALL – Play alone or with up to 8 players by passing a single controller — challenge your friends and set the highest scores! Games Included: • Bobsleigh Relay • Chilly Slices • Snowball Blast • Tetrice • Arctic Circle Skater • Frostbreaker • Snowdrift Racers • Winterpong • And many more!
Title: Winter Games Collection

description: SAVE CHRISTMAS WITH SANTA! COLLECT THE GIFTS AND SAVE CHRISTMAS! Santa's in trouble! It's Christmas Eve, and the presents are missing. Help Santa recover the gifts and save the day, so he can deliver them to children all over the world just in time for Christmas morning! EXPLORE 20 UNIQUE LEVELS! Travel across 20 distinct levels, each filled with fun challenges and hidden surprises. To complete a level, gather every last gift and unlock the magic portal that will take you to the next location! Can you find them all out? HELP SANTA SAVE CHRISTMAS! Play as Santa Claus in this exciting 3D platformer adventure. Navigate through festive environments, collecting all the gifts scattered across the North Pole and beyond! Join Santa on his Christmas adventure and help him deliver all the presents!
Title: Save Christmas With Santa

description: SAVE CHRISTMAS WITH SANTA! COLLECT THE GIFTS AND SAVE CHRISTMAS! Santa's in trouble! It's Christmas Eve, and the presents are missing. Travel across 20 distinct levels, each filled with fun challenges and hidden surprises. To complete a level, gather every last gift and unlock the magic portal that will take you to the next location! Can you find them all out? HELP SANTA SAVE CHRISTMAS! description: Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley is a story-rich musical adventure game about Snufkin restoring the valley and helping the quirky and memorable characters and critters who call it home. A series of hideous parks have cropped up in Moominvalley, disrupting the landscape and its harmonious nature. As Snufkin you will distract police officers, pull out signs, and knock over misplaced statues as you vigorously try to restore nature and the inhabitants’ home while putting an end to the industrious Park Keeper’s plans… Main features * Set out on a cozy, story-rich adventure game in a gorgeous storybook art style * Get the strict Park Keeper and his horrible parks out of Moominvalley with the help of your trusty harmonica, a bit of stealth, and the friends you’ll meet along the way * Meet over 50 charming characters and creatures calling Moominvalley their home * Experience narrative gameplay and a myriad of charming stories and quests involving the beloved characters inspired by Tove Jansson’s work * Explore Moominvalley’s open world and solve musical and environmental puzzles along the way to uncover the happenings in the valley * Immerse yourself in the beautiful soundscape of music and melodies composed in collaboration with Sigur RÃ³s
Title: Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley

description: Funko Fusion - The Office Cameo Pack “Would I rather be feared or loved? Easy. Both. I want people to be afraid of how much they love me.” Be afraid of how much you will love The Office Cameo Pack! Expand Funko Fusion with a cameo level from hit TV series The Office. Not only will you be able to take a tour around a BRAND NEW CAMEO LEVEL, you can also play as the following characters and their festive variants: - Michael - Dwight - Jim - Pam. Funko Fusion Experience a festival of fandom like never before in Funko Fusion! Play through iconic worlds and mashup characters inspired by some of your favorite franchises in an action-adventure game with uniquely authentic, irreverent humor from the creative minds of 10:10 Games. Express your fandom with 60+ unique playable characters from more than 20 fan-favorite franchises, all lovingly recreated in Funko Pop! form. Explore incredible worlds inspired by Jurassic World, Back to the Future, JAWS, The Thing, Chucky, Battlestar Galactica, Hot Fuzz, The Umbrella Academy, Five Nights at Freddy’s, Masters of the Universe, Invincible, and many more! Experience Beloved Worlds Battle foes and solve puzzles in diverse and expansive worlds that are rich with personality. Relive memorable moments from some of your favorite movies, TV shows, comics, and more in an authentic new experience made by fans, for fans. Fandom Fusion Play as your favorite characters and wield their unique weapons and skills. Funko Powered See the world of Funko come alive in a one-of-a-kind celebration of pop culture.
Title: Funko Fusion - The Office Cameo Pack Bundle

description: Find your warpath and go all the way. Remember that true strength is not in your body, but in your mind. Every step brings you closer to your goal. Make lightning decisions - there's no time to wait and doubt. The sharpness of your mind is also a weapon, and you must know how to use it. Move through levels without stopping and take out your enemies without regret. Face challenges without fear! Cross-Save: Pick up where you left off on PlayStationÂ®4 at any time on PlayStationÂ®5 by simply importing your save game from the PlayStationÂ®4 version! Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. Move like a ghost and hit from the shadows!
Title: Jumping Ninja

Explore incredible worlds inspired by Jurassic World, Back to the Future, JAWS, The Thing, Chucky, Battlestar Galactica, Hot Fuzz, The Umbrella Academy, Five Nights at Freddy’s, Masters of the Universe, Invincible, and many more! Relive memorable moments from some of your favorite movies, TV shows, comics, and more in an authentic new experience made by fans, for fans. description: This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4Â® version and the digital PS5Â® version of this game. The production company Ren works at has decided to put him in charge of a newbie idol group comprised of three young women: * Akko, the cheerful and energetic one. * Ibuki, the quiet and perplexing one. * Chiyoko, the proud and haughty one. Ren only has a month to whip these girls into shape. When the month ends, a competition awaits, only the most talented idol group will be crowned victorious. Maybe, if Ren makes a good enough impression, they might just fall in love with him, too. Features: * Match3 gameplay elements * Visual novel * Beautiful manga art * Gorgeous idols to romance If you already own the PS4Â® version of this game, you can get the PS5Â® digital version at no extra cost and you do not need to purchase this product. Owners of a PS4Â® disc copy must insert it into the PS5Â® every time they want to download or play the PS5Â® digital version. PS4Â® game disc owners who buy the PS5Â® Digital Edition disc-free console will not be able to get the PS5Â® version at no extra cost.
Title: Sakura Melody

description: Besiege is a physics based building game in which you construct medieval siege engines and lay waste to immense fortresses and peaceful hamlets. Build a machine which can crush windmills, wipe out battalions of brave soldiers and transport valuable resources, defending your creation against cannons, archers and whatever else the desperate enemies have at their disposal. Create a trundling behemoth, or take clumsily to the skies, and cause carnage in fully destructible environments. Ultimately, you must conquer every Kingdom by crippling their castles and annihilating their men and livestock, in as creative or clinical a manner as possible! Besiege Playstation Edition contains: - 4 Singleplayer campaign islands with a total of 55 levels for you to conquer - 3 Sandbox level environments for you to perfect your creation & test it out against the locals - 70 blocks and a complete set of building tools to help you construct your genius machines of doom - A Time Dilation Slider allowing you to slow down time during those epic crashing moments
Title: Besiege

description: Restore Color to the World In Farewell North you take on the unique role of a border collie restoring color to your human's world. Explore the hand-crafted, atmospheric islands inspired by the Scottish highlands and embark on a journey of companionship, trust and loss. A Spark of Life Whether it's herding flocks of sheep, highland coos, chickens or other animals, playing an impromptu game of fetch, helping the local farmers with their livestock, reuniting a trapped whale with its pod, finding lost ducklings, and much more, you're always finding ways to bring sparks of happiness to your human. Discover Hidden Paths Solve puzzles based on perspective and coloring to reveal hidden objects and paths in the environment. Find the perfect vantage point to reveal the secrets of the islands. Explore Land and Sea Journey at your own pace, running through lush grassy fields, hiking steep cliffs, and canoeing the ocean between an open world chain of islands inspired by the Scottish archipelagos of St. Kilda and Orkney. Uncover a Unique Story About Saying Farewell Unravel a unique story about saying farewell as memories reveal a glimpse into the life of the characters. Discover the events in the past which have led the characters to the archipelago, and caused all color to leave their world.
Title: Farewell North

description: Unleash chaos, mischief, and feline fury in Cat Simulator: Neighbor's Nightmare! Step into the paws of a cheeky, unpredictable cat determined to turn the neighborhood upside down. Whether you’re swiping food off tables, shredding curtains, or knocking over priceless vases, your mission is simple: cause as much mayhem as possible while dodging angry neighbors and their clever traps! In this hilarious and action-packed adventure, explore vibrant neighborhoods filled with unsuspecting targets. From cozy houses to bustling gardens, every corner hides new opportunities for mischief. Will you outsmart the humans and claim your throne as the ultimate neighborhood nightmare? Features • Be the Cat: Experience the world through a feline's eyes, from daring rooftop leaps to sneaky indoor escapades. • Wreak Havoc: Scratch, pounce, and knock over anything in your path to rack up points and laughs. • Dynamic Environments: Explore a lively neighborhood with interactive objects, quirky NPCs, and evolving challenges. • Creative Chaos: Use your wits (and claws) to complete playful missions, unlock secret areas, and discover hilarious surprises. • Dodge and Outsmart: Avoid traps set by frustrated neighbors and outwit their attempts to stop your reign of chaos. Ready to let your inner troublemaker loose? Pounce into Cat Simulator: Neighbor's Nightmare and show the world what true feline mischief looks like!
Title: Cat Simulator: Neighbor's Nightmare

description: It’s Christmas time, and following the annual tradition, it’s time for Santa's Icy Realm to be in full steam! Join the festive fun and search for all the Hidden Cats - one by one among the elves to colour the town, piece by piece! Play through different modes, find special cats, and unlock bonus levels! Features: - 900+ hidden cats... and other things to find! - Two main game modes – normal and advanced - Six unlockable bonus levels - A massive snowball fight at the end!
Title: Hidden Cats in Santa's Realm

description: It’s Christmas time, and following the annual tradition, it’s time for Santa's Icy Realm to be in full steam! Join the festive fun and search for all the Hidden Cats - one by one among the elves to colour the town, piece by piece! Play through different modes, find special cats, and unlock bonus levels! Features: - 900+ hidden cats... and other things to find! - Two main game modes – normal and advanced - Six unlockable bonus levels - A massive snowball fight at the end!
Title: Hidden Cats in Santa's Realm

description: HAJWALA 2 amps up high-speed drift racing in vast Gulf-inspired open worlds. With realistic car physics, stunning graphics, and new third-person characters, players can race, drift, and explore with total freedom. Experience the thrill of HAJWALA like never before.
Title: HAJWALA 2

description: Besiege is a physics based building game in which you construct medieval siege engines and lay waste to immense fortresses and peaceful hamlets. Build a machine which can crush windmills, wipe out battalions of brave soldiers and transport valuable resources, defending your creation against cannons, archers and whatever else the desperate enemies have at their disposal. Create a trundling behemoth, or take clumsily to the skies, and cause carnage in fully destructible environments. Ultimately, you must conquer every Kingdom by crippling their castles and annihilating their men and livestock, in as creative or clinical a manner as possible! Besiege Playstation Edition contains: - 4 Singleplayer campaign islands with a total of 55 levels for you to conquer - 3 Sandbox level environments for you to perfect your creation & test it out against the locals - 70 blocks and a complete set of building tools to help you construct your genius machines of doom - A Time Dilation Slider allowing you to slow down time during those epic crashing moments
Title: Besiege

description: The Ultimate Bundle contains the complete Shadow Tactics experience, including games and bonus DLC, in one package: -Shadow Tactics: Aiko's Choice - Game -Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun - Game -Shadow Tactics: Aiko's Choice - Soundtrack -Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun - Soundtrack -Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun - Artbook -Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun - Strategy Guide
Title: Shadow Tactics - Ultimate Bundle

description: The 2002 third-person survival horror shooter that serves as a sequel to the genre-defining 1982 film is back, remastered by Nightdive Studios to bring this innovative blend of fast paced squad action meets survival horror to the modern era. Including Antialiasing, Per Pixel Lighting, 4K Resolution and up to 120 FPS. Where the movie ended, the true terror begins. You are Cpt J.F. Blake, leader of a U.S. Special Forces rescue team sent to investigate the blood-curdling events and enigmatic deaths of the American scientific team that transpired at the Outpost 31 research facility located in the frozen wastelands of Antarctica. Within these inhospitable surroundings your team encounters a strange shape-shifting alien life-form that assumes the appearance of people that it kills. Trapped by the elements and infected by this horrific entity, using all your team members is critical if you hope to accomplish your objectives, let alone survive. If you only knew which ones were still human… The Thing: Remastered Key Features: • In 20 frightening levels, lead your team against terrifying monsters, from the scuttling head-spiders and human-like walkers to gigantic multi-tentacled beasts. • Advanced trust/fear interface adds a new level of interaction – How you influence your teams psychological state determines whether or not they will co-operate with you. • Experience brand new dynamic lighting, specular mapping, shadows, depth of field complemented by improved models, textures and environments to create a deep level of immersion. • Use awesome firepower like machine guns, explosives and flamethrowers to torch your enemies. • Brand new Achievements. • Quality of Life gameplay enhancements to improve your experience. • Choose multiple paths to solve problems that lie ahead and accomplish goals.
Title: The Thing: Remastered

description: Step up to the plate in Baseball, a simple yet thrilling game where you control all the action on the field. Choose between easy, medium, or hard difficulty to match your skill level and start swinging! As the hitter, perfect your timing to send the ball flying. Then, switch roles to the pitcher, where you’ll need precision and skill to fill the power meter and deliver the ultimate throw. If the opposing team connects, react quickly to pass the ball between bases and tag out their runners. Accessible and fun for all, Baseball brings endless excitement to every match!
Title: Baseball

description: Set in a huge open world reminiscent of the Americas during the golden age of steam trains, Railroads Online puts you in the role of a pioneer helping to shape the future of America. Build tracks, traverse vast landscapes in various steam locomotives, transport goods to earn money, and customize and buy new locomotives and equipment as you grow to become a railroad tycoon. Play alone or with up to 15 friends on 3 large maps, including Lake Valley, Aurora Falls, and Pine Valley, in the online cooperative multiplayer mode. Tracks, trains, & more Design your dream rail network from the ground up. Explore the world, scout the best routes, and lay down embankments, switches, turntables, and more. Then select and build tracks, bridges, and other infrastructure buildings before crossing the vast, open landscape in finely detailed locomotives and wagons. Interact with regulators, valves, brakes, couplers, and many more features in first-person view, as you drive your vehicles. But you won't simply be driving around aimlessly! Your mission is to build up your company by transporting goods for a broad range of industries across the country, including timber, ore, coal, cattle, gold, and other various freight items. Earn money for every successful shipment and invest in new vehicles or upgrade and customize your existing locomotives. Plus: build stations, yards, and other infrastructure along your routes to service your trains with fuel, water, and sand. You can also build a wide variety of iconic buildings and objects to create a beautiful landscape for your railroad network. Play the Railroad Sandbox with up to 16 players Enjoy a realistic railroad experience with the advanced Unreal Engine 5 physics system for deep railroad simulation. All collisions and forces are rendered dynamically in real time, making your train driving experience that much more immersive. So, be careful not to derail your train! And to top it all off, you can play Railroads Online with up to 16 players on a server and enjoy the ultimate train simulation in multiplayer sessions with your friends. Lay tracks and work together to move your trains seamlessly, or share the work while you play independently. It’s also possible to save and load your progress, so you can enjoy the best tracks or most creative layouts again and again. If you like trains, start your journey today! - Open World Sandbox for you to explore - Online multiplayer sessions with up to 16 players - Manage your own company - 3 different maps - Extremely detailed locomotives and other equipment - Drive your customized steam engines - Interact with regulators, valves, brakes, and appliances - Build stations, yards, and other infrastructure to service your trains - Build tracks, switches, and railroad facilities - Transport goods and earn money - Unreal 5 Engine for great visual quality - Enjoy a realistic railroad physics system
Title: Railroads Online

description: A hero with a flaw Wiktor Szulski is a thaumaturge, a master of mystical arts, who can peer into the hearts and minds of others, uncovering their deepest emotions, desires, and secrets. However, his powers also feed into his flaw of pride, which can present him with various opportunities or lead to negative consequences. Untold mysteries waiting to be revealed No secret or intrigue is safe when the thaumaturge is around. Your unique abilities will give you a great edge in solving detective investigations, becoming a savvy socialite or even dealing with the criminal underground. Explore the world using Wiktor’s perception, seeking personal secrets hidden in objects, that provide different perspectives on events that may seem obvious at first glance. Taming mythical creatures As a thaumaturge, you draw your power from the ability to summon salutors – mystical, folklore-inspired demons that inhabit the ethereal realm. Use their powers to manipulate your foes, sway the minds of allies, and fight opponents in turn-based tactical combat. Unique turn-based combat Engage in deep, tactical combat against various opponents – some physical, others more elusive. Wiktor's thaumaturgical abilities let you bend the rules of reality, summoning demons to unleash powerful attacks or gain strategic advantages. A rich gallery of characters The early 20th-century Warsaw is a multicultural metropolis with inhabitants from all walks of life. Among them, you’ll meet historical figures like the monk Rasputin or Tsar Nicholas II. The story also introduces you to a gallery of characters connected to Wiktor’s troubled past such as his well-versed sister Ligia or Abaurcy, a childhood friend who turned to a life of crime.
Title: The Thaumaturge

description: Bold, brazen champions must rise in the fight for tomorrow… Thirty-five years ago, the city of New Libertis was born from an explosive boom of technological marvels. In this new age, industrialist Hieronymus Frazer seeks to secure his legacy and usher in a grand ascension for humanity’s elite. To that end, anything and everything may be sacrificed for his greater vision. The fate of the city is in your hands! Diesel Legacy is a hand-drawn 2v2 fighting game – four players on two teams. Each beautiful stage features three lanes to freely move between, and even when a player is defeated their fight isn’t over! Work together to extend combos, parry attacks from beyond the grave, channel your essence to assist your teammate, and secure the double knockout! KEY FEATURES Determine the Fate of the Iron City – Lead 10 characters through their own unique story mode in an expansive dieselpunk-inspired universe. The battle for the future has reached its breaking point! 2v2 Action Packed Brawls – Four players choose from a roster of 10 dynamic playable characters and battle it out simultaneously online or offline! One Battle, Three Lanes – Run circles around your opponents across 10+ vividly detailed stages. Hop and dash between lanes to press the advantage and take the fight to a new dimension! Down…Not Out! – Even when a player is defeated, their fight isn’t over. Parry attacks from beyond the grave, channel your essence to help them break free, and assist your teammate to overcome the odds! Worldwide Netplay – 4-player online multiplayer battles featuring RealMatch rollback netcode ensures every match is virtually lag-free. Comprehensive Training Mode – Level up your skills solo or with a partner! Practice combos, record or analyze situations, view hitboxes and frame data, and refine team strategy together using an extensive set of training tools tailored to players of all skill levels. Advanced Replay System – Learn from your mistakes…and the mistakes of others! Play back matches with fast-forward, rewind, hitbox / frame data display and frame advance, plus take control at any point to redo the fight and change your fate.
Title: Diesel Legacy: The Brazen Age

description: Step into Dead Land: Polygon VR, a heart-pounding VR shooter that tests your reflexes and precision. Battle waves of polygon-shaped zombies in a series of high-stakes shooting ranges, where every shot counts. Avoid civilian targets as they mix with the undead in intense firefights, and stay sharp as the pressure mounts. With multiple game modes to choose from, Dead Land: Polygon VR offers a fresh, immersive take on the traditional shooting polygon. Use real-life shooting mechanics to aim, reload, and fire with accuracy while collecting power-ups to enhance your arsenal. Whether you're facing a zombie onslaught in Endless Mode or racing against time in Timed Mode, each mission brings unique challenges and thrills. Designed for fans of precision shooting and survival horror, Dead Land: Polygon VR delivers an unforgettable experience where strategy, speed, and accuracy are your ultimate weapons.
Title: Dead Land: Polygon VR

description: “Airport Contraband Police” is a game that allows you to step onto the front lines of the battle against illegal contraband trafficking at an international airport. As a police, you're responsible for ensuring security and preventing the smuggling of illegal goods and materials across the border. Missions and Challenges: Your task is to uncover illegal schemes and find contraband in the airport. You will embark on various missions, including covert searches, passenger interrogations, and luggage analysis. Solve puzzles to uncover hidden items and evidence. Your skills of observation and analysis will be key to successfully completing tasks. You will use advanced equipment to detect violations and protect the airport's security. Diverse Equipment: The game provides you access to a wide range of police technology and tools for detecting contraband. From X-ray scanners and night vision cameras to metal detectors and police dogs, you have everything you need to carry out your tasks. With each mission, the level of difficulty will increase, demanding agility, thoroughness, and professionalism to ensure the safety of the airport and its passengers. Character Development: Gradually increase your level and gain access to new skills and equipment. Improve your character to become a true expert in contraband detection. Each achievement in your career as a police agent at the airport will not only bring you bonuses and enhanced capabilities but also more challenging assignments A Variety of Contraband Goods: You can expect a variety of contraband goods, from drugs and weapons to smuggled animals and counterfeit documents. You'll need to explore various methods and places where contraband can be hidden. These may include false compartments in luggage, hidden pockets in passengers' clothing, special containers with double bottoms, and even the internal organs of live couriers. Difficulty and Dynamics: The game offers various levels of difficulty, ranging from simple searches to complex operations to apprehend violators. The dynamic gameplay will require you to make quick decisions and act against the clock.
Title: Airport Police Contraband Simulator - Border Patrol

description: Wales Interactive have bundled six titles including the hit FMV games, Late Shift and The Bunker. Soul Axiom and Knee Deep round up the story-rich adventures and featuring fast-paced action at super speeds with Coffin Dodgers and Infinity Runner! Games Included: Late Shift The Bunker Soul Axiom Knee Deep Coffin Dodgers Infinity Runner
Title: Wales Interactive Bundle

description: LibertÃ©: Dive into the Dark Revolution Step into the chaos of the French Revolution like never before. LibertÃ© is a thrilling action roguelike with deck-builder set in an alternate-history Paris, where political unrest collides with cosmic terror. Take control of RenÃ©, a Parisian caught in a deadly struggle among four factions while being manipulated by the mysterious Lady Bliss, an interdimensional being with her dark motives. A Battle for Paris—and Your Soul Paris has fallen into turmoil following the death of the king. Amidst this, Lady Bliss has appeared, turning the revolution upside down. As RenÃ©, you must venture through war-torn streets, nurturing alliances and piecing together the truth behind Lady Bliss and her sinister agenda. Why has she chosen you, an ordinary citizen, to find Paris’s new ruler? Deck-Building Meets Roguelike Combat Customize Your Playstyle: With over 100 skill and talent cards to collect, you can adapt your strategy each run. Wield guns, blades, axes, or even music to lead the revolution! Play as Multiple Characters: RenÃ© can shift between different forms, from a master hunter to a tribal warrior. Each character brings unique abilities to the fight. Dynamic Combat: Face evolving challenges with varied enemies, including eldritch creatures and Parisian rebels. Every run will test your strategic adaptability. A Twisted Parisian Landscape Revolutionary France Meets Lovecraftian Horror: Explore a Paris like no other, where historical events and characters are blended with cosmic, body horror inspired by the works of H.P. Lovecraft and David Cronenberg. Four Factions, One City: Align yourself with the Tribe, Crown, Congregation, or Rebels, each with its own goals, allies, and enemies. Your decisions will influence the fate of the revolution. Over 40 Hours of Revolutionary Gameplay With nearly 40 hours of gameplay, LibertÃ© offers an expansive experience. From intense battles to political intrigue, every decision matters. Each faction, character, and mission brings new possibilities, ensuring every run feels fresh and unpredictable.
Title: Liberte

description: Summary: Return to the Sierra Research Facility, now overrun by dinosaurs in the Alaskan wilderness. Assume the role of Jack Allen, the point man of PMC Alpha, a team of mercenaries assigned to unravel the mystery behind the dinosaur outbreak. Gameplay and Features: Fossilfuel 2 boasts a diverse array of terrifying dinosaurs, from Utahraptor to Spinosaurus. Survive using your wits, strategically utilizing items and weapons found along the way. The game offers multipath gameplay, allowing players to make choices that dynamically shape the narrative, leading to multiple endings based on their actions. Additionally, enjoy RPG elements such as in-game shops and item collections to level up your character and achievements. Can you conquer nature and survive? Horde Mode: Fossilfuel 2 introduces a challenging horde mode, where players can push their skills to the limit and unlock achievements. Multiple Endings: Player actions matter. Progress through the game, and your decisions will influence its course. Fossilfuel 2 adapts to your playstyle and choices, ensuring significant replay value with multiple endings across 6 to 10 hours of gameplay. Play as a Raptor: Experience Raptor gameplay, enabling players to take control of a Velociraptor. Sneak through vents and corridors to eliminate human intruders, turning the tables on the survival dynamic. Primal Mode: The adventure doesn't end after beating the game. Unlock Primal Mode, where Fossilfuel 2 transforms from a survival horror game into an action-packed experience. Start with the best weapons, face doubled and buffed enemies with new challenges, as the developers throw everything at you!
Title: Fossilfuel 2

description: Cross-buy: With the purchase of this bundle you will receive the PlayStationÂ®4 and PlayStationÂ®5 version of the game. Cross-Save: Pick up playing on the PlayStationÂ®5 exactly where you left off on the PlayStationÂ®4 at any time by simply importing the save game from the PlayStationÂ®4 version! From the makers of The Jumping Food Games comes a thrilling, nerve-wracking endless game: "Infinite Switch". In this game that pushes your reflexes to their limits, you fight your way through an infinitely generated level that gets trickier and more difficult with every moment. What can you expect in "Infinite Switch"? Endless procedurally generated levels: Every time you play, a new, dynamic challenge awaits you - no two runs are the same. Impossible to master: The game is considered almost impossible to master. It is designed to test your reflexes, reactions and stamina time and time again. Increasing difficulty: The further you get, the more difficult the game becomes. Are you ready to face the endless levels and reach the top of the leaderboard? Challenging reflex game: Perfect your timing and reaction skills in an environment that mercilessly punishes every mistake. Will you be the one to make the impossible possible? Take on the ultimate challenge in "Infinite Switch" and test your reflexes in an endless, ever-evolving adventure.
Title: Infinite Switch -

description: Experience a collection of retro survival horror nightmares as the undead and dinosaurs destroy a sleepy midwestern town!
Title: Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split

description: The Fox Holeshot Edition gives you access to 4 exclusive Fox suits for your rider. After a 3-year break, the official game of the MXGP is back. All the official bikes and 20 tracks of the 2024 calendar await to give you the full championship experience. Play as your favourite riders, such as Jorge Prado, Jeffrey Herlings, Maxime Renaux and Andrea Adamo in the MXGP and MX2 categories. Over 50 riders are available, including those from official teams like Red Bull KTM, Red Bull GasGas, Monster Energy Yamaha, Honda HRC, Kawasaki, Nestaan Husqvarna, Monster Energy Triumph, Fantic and Beta MRT. The extensive career mode offers full immersion in the championship. Manage the development of your team, schedule and rivalries. Start out as an amateur rider with the aim of being recruited by an MX2 team and, once in the MX2, achieve great results to be selected to join an MXGP team. By free riding around the 4 kmÂ² (1.5 sq. mi.) training area, you can improve your technique and test your bike on six circuits and different terrain types. MXGP is a realistic game that uses advanced physics to provide intense riding sensations, while offering user-friendly controls to help beginners quickly improve. And for the more competitive players, the online multiplayer mode lets you compete against the best riders in the world.
Title: MXGP 24 - Fox Holeshot Edition

description: Fallen heroes of old folk tales and legends: you are on the verge of a crucial battle against the Nightmare invading and corrupting your world. A roguelike action game by the creators of Curse of the Dead GodsÂ©, playable solo or in online co-op. Choose a side and show your support for the game with the Legendary Edition. Includes: * Ravenswatch game * Ravens Skin Pack: 9 exclusive Ravenswatch-themed outfits for Scarlet, Beowulf, Snow Queen, Pied Piper, Aladdin, Geppetto, Sun Wukong, Melusine and Carmilla. Available from the hero selection menu. * Nightmares Skin Pack: 9 exclusive Nightmare-themed outfits for the same heroes and available from the same menu. * Digital Soundtrack: an enchanting musical adventure! Immerse yourself in the unique atmosphere of Ravenswatch with the game's original soundtrack, mastered on a 20-track album. * Digital Artbook: 150 pages of concept art and illustrations that recount the graphical design of the game, from pencil sketches to 3D animation.
Title: Ravenswatch - Legendary Edition

description: Path Of The Builder is a casual, physics-based game that takes players on a journey of destruction and creativity, where every ruin holds the potential for a masterpiece. Armed with powerful tools, players demolish old structures piece by piece, collecting valuable resources to construct innovative new creations. Switch between the thrill of smashing through walls and the satisfaction of designing unique structures from the ground up. Whether building simple homes or grand monuments, every level presents new challenges that require both strategic resource management and creative construction skills. Dive into the story-driven campaign to complete engaging missions or let your imagination roam free in sandbox mode. "Path Of The Builder" lets you experience the thrill of transformation, as you turn ruins into works of art.
Title: Path Of The Builder

description: Path Of The Builder is a casual, physics-based game that takes players on a journey of destruction and creativity, where every ruin holds the potential for a masterpiece. Armed with powerful tools, players demolish old structures piece by piece, collecting valuable resources to construct innovative new creations. Switch between the thrill of smashing through walls and the satisfaction of designing unique structures from the ground up. Whether building simple homes or grand monuments, every level presents new challenges that require both strategic resource management and creative construction skills. Dive into the story-driven campaign to complete engaging missions or let your imagination roam free in sandbox mode. "Path Of The Builder" lets you experience the thrill of transformation, as you turn ruins into works of art.
Title: Path Of The Builder

description: "Stunt Scooter Simulator" immerses players in a thrilling experience where customization and stunts reign supreme. Craft your own adventure by choosing from a variety of scooter models and customizing them with vibrant colors, decals, and performance upgrades. Take to the streets and perform jaw-dropping tricks to earn points for further customization. Whether you're a novice or a pro, defy gravity and push your limits in this dynamic simulation. Get ready to embark on the ultimate stunt-riding adventure! Features: 1. Customization: Personalize your scooter with various models, colors, decals, and performance upgrades. 2. Stunt Performances: Execute jaw-dropping tricks in diverse locations to earn points and unlock new customization options. 3. Dynamic Gameplay: Experience the thrill of pushing your limits with gravity-defying flips and intricate maneuvers. 4. Multiple Maps: Master your skills across a variety of unique environments on your quest for scooter supremacy.
Title: Stunt Scooter Simulator

description: Step into the wild with "Wolf Sim: Animal Battle Survival RPG," where you embody the powerful predator of the forest. As a formidable wolf, your quest is to hunt, conquer territories, and establish your dominance in a vast open world. Engage in thrilling hunts, face off against rival Alphas, and grow your pack to become the ultimate ruler of the wild. Features: - Realistic Hunting: Experience dynamic and realistic hunting scenarios, from stalking prey to engaging in fierce battles with other animals. - Alpha Battles: Fight and defeat rival Alphas to claim and expand your territory, proving your supremacy in the wild. - Pack Dynamics: Raise and train your pups to assist in hunting and surviving against larger, more dangerous animals like bears and tigers. - Exploration: Discover and explore stunning, diverse locations with your pack, from dense forests to open plains. - Customizable Skins: Choose from a variety of wolf skins, each with unique stories and designs, enhancing both your appearance and gameplay experience. - Power Progression: Hunt to gain experience and upgrade your wolf's abilities, making each hunt more spectacular and each battle more intense. - Stealth Mechanics: Use stealth and strategy to approach and catch wary prey, adding depth and challenge to your hunting tactics. - Dynamic Ecosystem: Interact with a living, breathing world where each animal has its own behaviors and responses, creating a rich, immersive environment. Unleash your wild side and prove your dominance in "Wolf Sim: Animal Battle Survival RPG." Hunt, battle, and conquer to rise as the true Alpha of the wilderness.
Title: Wolf Sim: Animal Battle Survival RPG

description: You are a Tromboner… It’s finally time to step up and fulfill your destiny in Trombone Champ: Unflattened! A rhythm game where every note, slide and triumphant toot is yours to command. With 58 unforgettable tracks, custom song support, campaign mode, collectible Tromboner Cards, and wild trombones with unique sounds to unlock, you’re not just playing along with the music—you’re creating it! FIND YOUR GROOVE Play the trombone your way—every note, every slide, every majestic honk is yours to control. You’re not just keeping up with the rhythm; you are the rhythm. A ROAD PAVED IN BRASS Toot your way through an all-new campaign packed with surprises, unlock fresh challenges, and climb the leaderboards on your way to glory. HOARD OF HORNS Amass a treasure trove of trombones, each one wilder than the last. With 25+ unique designs and new trombones regularly, there’s always another horn to hunt! IF YOU PLAY YOUR CARDS RIGHT… ‎ Build your ultimate deck with 50 Tromboner Cards packed with absurd trivia and legendary trombone lore. Trombone Champ: Unflattened! lets you wield your virtual trombone across over 58 tracks, spanning anthems, marches, classical bangers, and folk classics. Each piece is handcrafted to keep you honking and sliding to your heart’s content, with plenty of surprises and unlockables along the way to keep you coming back for more.
Title: Trombone Champ: Unflattened!

description: Wales Interactive is proud to offer the ultimate bundle for their very best FMV games! Featuring Night Book, Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus? Bloodshore, Five Dates and I Saw Black Clouds in one bundle! NIGHT BOOK An online interpreter is tricked into reading an ancient book that summons a demon into her home.Night Book is an interactive psychological thriller with supernatural elements and branching storylines. WHO PRESSED MUTE ON UNCLE MARCUS? An eccentric FMV murder mystery with a twist: someone has poisoned Uncle Marcus. Uncover the truth in the yearly family quiz and try to save him before it is too late. BLOODSHORE Bloodshore is an interactive action movie about a televised battle royale between high-profile streamers, entertainers and death row inmates. You control the fate of Nick, a washed-up actor who fights for a life-changing cash prize. FIVE DATES Five Dates is an interactive rom-com about the unpredictable world of digital dating. With five potential female matches, Vinny explores whether compatibility, chemistry and connection is still possible in a world where physical touch is no longer an option. I SAW BLACK CLOUDS After the unexpected death of a close friend, Kristina returns to her hometown looking for answers, only to unearth a string of dark secrets. I Saw Black Clouds is an interactive psychological thriller with supernatural elements and branching storylines. Already have one FMV but not the other? With this bundle, pay nothing on the game you already own but still receive discount on the other!
Title: The Ultimate FMV Bundle 2

description: Cross-buy: With the purchase of this bundle you will receive the PlayStationÂ®4 and PlayStationÂ®5 version of the game. Cross-Save: Pick up playing on the PlayStationÂ®5 exactly where you left off on the PlayStationÂ®4 at any time by simply importing the save game from the PlayStationÂ®4 version! From the makers of The Jumping Food Games comes the sequel to the popular puzzle game "Bust a Block". In this expansion you can expect 25 new, tricky levels in which the aim is to destroy cleverly arranged blocks with just one shot! What can you expect in "Bust a Block 2"? Challenging puzzle gameplay: Every action counts! Find the perfect angle and place your shot strategically to destroy all the blocks at once. 25 cleverly designed levels: Experience an ever-increasing challenge where each level surprises you with increasingly complicated block formations. Tactics and skill: Think carefully about how you place your shot - one mistake and the blocks will stop! Will you master all the levels? Can you make the perfect shot and destroy all the blocks in one go? Prove your skill and become the master in "Bust a Block 2"!
Title: Bust A Block 2 -

description: A new way to experience car drifting. Enjoy every turn in a calm and easy driving. Just let your car drift and slide down the road. Catch the Zen! The racetrack is the place to be. Feel the rhythm. You'll appreciate the feeling of navigating long turns and drifting effortlessly. The key is to find the rhythm in each move to successfully navigate the turns. Cross-Save: Pick up where you left off on PlayStationÂ®4 at any time on PlayStationÂ®5 by simply importing your save game from the PlayStationÂ®4 version! Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. There's no need to rush – just drift and relax.
Title: Zen Drift

description: As you wake up, stirred from a dreamless sleep with an unknown purpose, you find yourself in the strange lands of Mare embodying a mysterious mechanical bird. Crossing paths with a helpless companion you venture deep into unknown territory on a puzzling adventure while unraveling a mysterious narrative and the secrets hidden within. All in order to ensure the arrival of the companion at her impending destiny. Features: • Full Eye-Tracking gameplay option available. • Explore the vast and strange landscapes from a viewpoint of a mechanical bird. • Guide and protect a vulnerable AI companion on her unexpected adventure. • Explore and discover the underlying narrative spanning over 8 chapters. • Immerse yourself in the ambient atmosphere and otherworldly music for a soothing experience. • Search for lost artifacts hidden throughout the world in order to unlock the final secret of Mare.
Title: Mare

description: [This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4Â® version and the digital PS5Â® version of this game.] "Monster Prom 2: Monster Camp" brings you more of the world's best (and maybe only?) multiplayer dating sim, but in a way you've never expected! The original Monster Prom is a multiplayer dating sim that shines for its beautiful art and unapologetic humour. The sequel brings you into a new setting (summer camp) with new characters to romance, including old faces and new ones: Damien, Calculester, Milo, Dahlia, Joy, and Aaravi. But that's not all: Monster Camp comes with other new twists here and there, from the campfire mechanics to a new stage full of magic mixed drinks. But that’s not all! The XXL version includes ALL of the non-Kickstarter exclusive outfit packs! We're taking the best parts of the popular "Monster Prom" formula, but adding some new spice to it. description: [This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4Â® version and the digital PS5Â® version of this game.] "Monster Prom 3: Monster Roadtrip" finally answers the age-old question: "What if we added survival mechanics to a beloved dating sim franchise?" Monster Roadtrip adds a twist to its predecessors Monster Prom and Monster Camp, multiplayer dating sims brimming with beautiful art and unapologetic humour. This sequel takes you on an unforgettable road trip along with fan-favourites Scott and Polly. On the way, you will stay at crummy motels, engage in dark cult rituals, help out strangers on the road and pick up more hitchhikers than Scott can count. Bump into old friends and meet plenty of new faces on your way to one of six destinations! Monster Roadtrip adds three difficulty levels to customise your road trip, and two different multiplayer modes: cooperate with other players or compete to see who the Ultimate Prank Master is! And if it's romance you're looking for, don't fret: we've got you covered! More than 15 characters are waiting for you on the road. Meet them, sit together by the benches at the rest stop, and hold intimate conversations that may lead to love. But that's not all! The XXL version includes ALL of the extra playable characters: Zoe, Juan, Hazel and Glitch! Monster Roadtrip has everything you love about the "Monster Prom" formula, and adds new mechanics for a road trip you will remember forever! ;) [If you already own the PS4Â® version of this game, you can get the PS5Â® digital version at no extra cost and you do not need to purchase this product. Owners of a PS4Â® disc copy must insert it into the PS5Â® every time they want to download or play the PS5Â® digital version. description: Become Agent 70 and stop the anomalies threatening to destroy the balance of the world! Use extraordinary anomaly weapons to toss your opponents around! Overcome your enemies using melee techniques or deadly firearms! Modify your gameplay by upgrading your character in different ways. Escape your pursuers with acrobatic moves. Shape how the story unfolds. Unravel the mysteries you face and make the world a safer place... or plunge it into disaster. With memorable characters, unique Anomaly Bosses, a story full of twists, and smooth gameplay, Anomaly Agent is an adventure to be savored. We hope you enjoy your journey!
Title: Anomaly Agent

description: Embark on an exhilarating spacefaring adventure with Star Truck Simulator! Immerse yourself in the role of an interstellar trucker, piloting your rocket-powered rig across the vast expanse of the galaxy. Haul valuable cargo, scavenge for precious salvage, and navigate the unique challenges of deep space. With a blend of sci-fi excitement and trucking simulation, this game offers a rich and engaging experience that combines the thrill of cosmic exploration with the precision of cargo management. In Star Truck Simulator, you'll explore diverse planetary systems, interact with a colorful array of star-hopping truckers, and tackle missions that range from routine deliveries to perilous drop-offs. Prepare for an adventure where every trip is a new challenge and every star system holds a new opportunity. Key Features: - Cruise the Galactic Highways Take on a range of missions, from fuel-hungry long hauls to hazardous drop-offs. Earn cash and unlock new upgrades while interacting with a diverse cast of star-hopping truckers. - Manage and Maintain Your Rig Keep your truck running smoothly by managing essential systems. Make regular shop stops for repairs, and consider upgrading your rig to enhance performance. Proper maintenance of your gravity compensator and hull is crucial for navigating volatile sectors and ensuring timely deliveries. - Hyperjump Through the Stars Plan your interstellar routes using the galactic map, and make strategic warp jumps to save time and fuel. - Immersive Space Trucking Experience Dive into a detailed and engaging universe with complex systems and challenges. Star Truck Simulator delivers a rich space trucking adventure, blending realistic mechanics with sci-fi thrills for an unforgettable journey through the stars.
Title: Star Truck Simulator

description: Dorfs: Hammers for Hire is an arcade co-op game about a group of dwarven weaponcrafters and armorsmiths, traveling through the world to wherever the scent of war and gold takes them. Participating indirectly in various battles, the crew of the Dorfenwagen only has a limited time to deliver all the armaments that the soldiers request, putting them in a constant race against time and the unstoppable advance of the enemy. Co-Op Campaign Up to four players can participate in a Campaign that takes them across 5 Regions and 30 hand-crafted levels. Arcade Classic Work together to clear 10 more levels in any order of your choice. Versus Battle Hammer against your friends in this 2v2 Versus mode in any of the 5 arenas to fight in! Same level, same items, same challenges.
Title: Dorfs: Hammers for Hire

Title: Dorfs: Hammers for Hire

description: Ada is a young yet bright girl who, after visiting her father’s laboratory, decides to dive without his permission into Codeland, a virtual world being developed by him, just for fun but... A fatal error, Codeland filled with bugs, an unfriendly bunny as a guide, her father and his colleagues are trapped and unresponsive, there are enemies and errors all around! Only someone worthy to wield the hammer.exe can debug it all! Show your logical skills and quick mind to help Ada save Codeland by defeating enemies and clear dungeons in this fun and thrilling action adventure full of logical puzzles, loops, and fun visual algorithms suited for players of all ages. FEATURES AND CONTENT EXPLORE AND BEAT ENEMIES WITH THE HAMMER.EXE • Run, dash, avoid traps and fly over cliffs to explore Codeland. • Use the hammer.exe to defeat enemies, activate switches and open new paths • 5 upgradeable skills (Glitch Dash, Super Strength, Glitch Bolt, Cyberspin & Glitch Trap) • Different enemies, each with their own unique attack patterns! • Thrilling battles against warped bosses. Show off your skills and clean the errors on their programming! SOLVE FUN CODING ALGORITHMS AND SAVE THE DAY • Use blocks to design easy algorithms and learn about loops, functions and other coding concepts in an easy and fun way. • Learn programming jargon thanks to amusing dialogues between charismatic characters. • All coding puzzles are adapted to age so everyone can enjoy and learn! A DIGITAL WORLD FULL OF DANGERS AND PUZZLES! • Three worlds to explore: Order, Candy and Music worlds! • A digital world with bright 2D cartoon art style and visuals • +10 levels with careful design and mechanics inside each world. • Interact with the environment to collect bits, find more hearts and energy and improve Ada’s power! • Know hilarious, charismatic and compelling characters in a story about friendship, courage and wits! JOIN ADA AND SHOW YOUR SKILLS TO UNLOCK CODES AND DEFEAT ENEMIES! Codeland is in your hands. Do you have what it takes to save it before it's too late? The fate of this digital world relies on you!
Title: Glitch Hero

description: Edition includes: LEGOÂ® Horizon Adventuresâ„¢ Journey to a distant future, where the land is made of LEGO bricks and lush nature has reclaimed the Earth. Meet the Nora tribe who live in the settlement of Mother’s Heart, and catch your first glimpse of the incredible dinosaur-like machines that roam the forests, mountains, and deserts that stretch beyond the village walls... The LEGO adventure of a lifetime Join hunter Aloy as she battles to save Earth from an ancient digital demon, and a gang of sunworshippers who want to live in a world without shade so they can soak up the rays while everything burns. Play alone or with friends Hunt machines on your own as Aloy, or unlock colourful heroes Varl, Teersa, and Erend, and use their unique skills to defeat enemies and overcome challenges. Share the fun with another player online**, or via innovative couch co-op on a single screen, so you’re always in the same world together. Customize your home and your characters Give the village of Mother’s Heart a unique makeover, decorating it in delightful ways to unlock unique LEGO buildings and ornaments. You can even dish out hilarious outfits for your friends to wear! For LEGO and Horizon fans new and old Uncover secrets from Aloy’s mysterious past as you explore stunning LEGO locations inspired by the world of Horizon, including thriving forests and soaring mountains. Delve deep into the underground Cauldrons or climb the iconic Tallnecks – all beautifully recreated in LEGO bricks. Need an extra challenge? Replay levels that change to test your skills and unlock new surprises, or check the Mother's Heart Community Board for ways to help the village. See if you've got what it takes to ace every aspect of the game!
Title: LEGOÂ® Horizon Adventuresâ„¢

description: Wales Interactive are proud to offer three FMV games, Late Shift, The Bunker and The Shapeshifting Detective, all discounted in one bundle! LATE SHIFT Late Shift is a high stakes FMV crime thriller. Forced into a brutal London heist, you must choose your own adventure in this interactive cinematic experience with adaptable storylines that lead to one of seven conclusions. Your decisions are you. THE SHAPESHIFTING DETECTIVE The Shapeshifting Detective is a supernatural-noir murder mystery FMV game where you play as a detective who can shapeshift into other characters, allowing you to unlock secret conversations and private encounters. The game features more than 1600 full HD video responses, a simple questioning interface with unique ‘delete’ mechanic, and a randomly chosen murderer at the start of the game. THE BUNKER The Bunker is a completely live-action experience, filmed on location in a decommissioned government nuclear bunker with a plot crafted by writers behind The Witcher, SOMA and Broken Sword. Starring an incredible cast including Adam Brown (The Hobbit), Sarah Greene (Penny Dreadful) and Grahame Fox (Game of Thrones).
Title: The FMV Collection 2

description: Experience the rush of motorsport in a unique blend of simulation and arcade racing, crafted with passion by true racing enthusiasts. With gameplay that’s easy to jump into but rewards precision and mastery, this game invites you to chase that flawless lap again and again. Feel the tires grip the track as you zoom past the start/finish line and tackle each hairpin turn, brakes screeching as you navigate every curve with intensity. Take on 18 dynamic tracks and command 32 distinct cars, each with a unique handling style to master. Test your skills against a range of AI difficulties in single-player mode, or bring the competition home with local multiplayer to race head-to-head with friends.
Title: Racing Champions
Publisher: Revulo Games sp. z o. o.
